message:
Anyone picking up Bastion? Reviews are very positive so far. 

Some guy gave it a 4/5 over here: http://www.joystiq.com/2011/07/19/bastion-review/

I'm definitely getting this and Insanely Twisted Shadow Planet, and possibly also From Dust and Fruit Ninja Kinect. Just not now. I need to get my backlog a bit under control first, and might just wait for some of these games to eventually go on sale.
On the other hand, Insanely Twisted Shadow Planet and From Dust I must have *now*.
I really want to play Bastion, but it's the sort of game I can easily wait to go on sale.
Bought Insanely Twisted Shadow Planet. The art's pretty, but I'm not zomgd.
I *like* ISTP but there's something missing. It reminds me of Limbo in that once you get past the opening, it's not nearly as atmospheric as promised. Everything gets a little mechanical.
